summary: Self-taught expert in creative excuse generation with 15+ years of successfully avoiding real responsibility. Started as a 19-year-old who 'was just taking a gap year' and somehow scaled that into a full-time lifestyle. Predicted the rise of remote work in 2019 - mainly because leaving the house seemed like too much effort.

Identified inefficiencies in motivation that led to current lifestyle solutions.
